content: Sure! To obtain the Heart Tank on the first visit to Chill Penguin's stage, you will need to have Boomerang Cutter or Shotgun Ice in your possession. This Heart Tank is located in the second section of the stage, where you will encounter a series of moving platforms above a bottomless pit. Use Boomerang Cutter or Shotgun Ice to break the blocks on the wall to the right of the platforms to reveal a hidden room. Enter the room to find the Heart Tank.
